Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerAndComponents

Class ProductionPower

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerAndComponents.ProductionPower
Direct Known Subclasses:
LeaderProduction
public class ProductionPower
extends java.lang.Object
this class represent the production power associated with the dashboard

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Modifier Constructor Description
      ProductionPower()
    this constructor create an empty stack of cards
    protected ProductionPower​(java.util.Stack<DevelopmentCard>[] personalCards)
    this constructor is needed to create a run-time change of the dynamic type of the class from ProductionPower to LeaderProduction

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void activateBasicProduction()
    this method activate the basic production.
    void activateLeaderProduction​(int toActivate)
    this method activate the leader production if it exist, do nothing if the leader production does not exist.
    void activateProduction​(int toActivate)
    this method activate the production for the card selected.
    void addLeaderProduction​(Resource toAdd)
    this method is empty because needs to be overried by the subclass LeaderProduction
    boolean checkPlacement​(DevelopmentCard toCheck, int position)
    this method verify if a placement of a card is legit or not
    DevelopmentCard getCard​(int position)
    this method get the card at position specified at the position selected if it exists
    Resource getInput​(int index)
    this method is empty because needs to be overried by the subclass LeaderProduction

    this method get the number of cards owned
    java.util.Stack<DevelopmentCard>[] getPersonalCards()
    this method get the personal cards
    int getVictoryPoints()
    this method get all the victory points of the cards in the array
    boolean isBasicProductionActivated()
    this method verify if the basic production can be activated
    boolean isLeaderProductionActivated​(int toCheck)
    this method verify if the leader production associated with the index in input is active or not.
    boolean isProductionActivated​(int toCheck)
    this method verify if the card in position specified by the parameter can be activated if the production selected does not exist, return false
    boolean placeCard​(DevelopmentCard toPlace, int position)
    this method place a development card in the stack selected by position
    void resetProductions()
    this method reset the productions for every card (counting leader ones) of the dashboard and the basic production, so that the turn after the owner of the card can activate them again

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ProductionPower

      public ProductionPower()
      this constructor create an empty stack of cards

    • ProductionPower

      protected ProductionPower​(java.util.Stack<DevelopmentCard>[] personalCards)
      this constructor is needed to create a run-time change of the dynamic type of the class from ProductionPower to LeaderProduction
      Parameters:
      personalCards - these are the personal cards to set

  • Method Details

    • getPersonalCards

      public java.util.Stack<DevelopmentCard>[] getPersonalCards()
      this method get the personal cards
      Returns:
      the personal cards

    • placeCard

      public boolean placeCard​(DevelopmentCard toPlace, int position)
      this method place a development card in the stack selected by position
      Parameters:
      toPlace - this is the card to place
      position - this is the position of the array of card in which the method have to insert the card in input, it should go from 1 to 3
      Returns:
      the result of the method checkPlacement

    • getCard

      public DevelopmentCard getCard​(int position)
      this method get the card at position specified at the position selected if it exists
      Parameters:
      position - this is the position of the array of cards, it goes from 1 to 3
      Returns:
      the card at position specified by the parameter if it exists, null if the deck is empty

    • checkPlacement

      public boolean checkPlacement​(DevelopmentCard toCheck, int position)
      this method verify if a placement of a card is legit or not
      Parameters:
      toCheck - this is the card to check, it requires that is not null
      position - this is the position of the array of card in which the method have to check, it should go from 1 to 3
      Returns:
      true if the level of the card in input is a level up compared to the card in the position in input or the card in input has a level one and the deck of cards specified in input is empty, false if not, or if the position is not between 1 and 3

    • getNumOfCards

      public int getNumOfCards()
      this method get the number of cards owned
      Returns:
      the total number of cards in the array of stacks

    • getVictoryPoints

      public int getVictoryPoints()
      this method get all the victory points of the cards in the array
      Returns:
      the sum of all the victory points referred to every card contained in the array

    • getInput

      public Resource getInput​(int index)
      this method is empty because needs to be overried by the subclass LeaderProduction
      Parameters:
      index - this is the index of the resource that should be got
      Returns:
      null

    • addLeaderProduction

      public void addLeaderProduction​(Resource toAdd)
      this method is empty because needs to be overried by the subclass LeaderProduction
      Parameters:
      toAdd - this is the resource to add

    • activateProduction

      public void activateProduction​(int toActivate)
      this method activate the production for the card selected. in particular, it simply set the attribute productionActivated of the card with the position specified in the parameter to true. if the card selected does not exist, do nothing
      Parameters:
      toActivate - this is the index of the card to activate

    • activateBasicProduction

      public void activateBasicProduction()
      this method activate the basic production. in particular, it simply set the attribute basicProductionActivated to true

    • activateLeaderProduction

      public void activateLeaderProduction​(int toActivate)
      this method activate the leader production if it exist, do nothing if the leader production does not exist. in particular, it simply set to true the attribute leaderProductionActivated associated with the index specified in input
      Parameters:
      toActivate - this is the index associated with the leader production to activate, it should be from 1 to 2

    • resetProductions

      public void resetProductions()
      this method reset the productions for every card (counting leader ones) of the dashboard and the basic production, so that the turn after the owner of the card can activate them again

    • isProductionActivated

      public boolean isProductionActivated​(int toCheck)
      this method verify if the card in position specified by the parameter can be activated if the production selected does not exist, return false
      Parameters:
      toCheck - this is the position of the card to check
      Returns:
      true if the card has been already activated during the turn, false otherwise

    • isBasicProductionActivated

      public boolean isBasicProductionActivated()
      this method verify if the basic production can be activated
      Returns:
      true if the basic production has been already activated during the turn, false otherwise

    • isLeaderProductionActivated

      public boolean isLeaderProductionActivated​(int toCheck)
      this method verify if the leader production associated with the index in input is active or not. the method always return false when the card doesn't exist
      Parameters:
      toCheck - this is the index associated with the leader production to activate
      Returns:
      true if the leader production has already been activated during the turn, false otherwise

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
